events.message: Customer reported a car accident that occurred at an intersection and filed a claim promptly afterward.
The claim has been categorized under auto accident after reviewing the initial report and vehicle details.
An insurance agent has been assigned to the case to facilitate the claim process efficiently.
The claim has been officially acknowledged by the insurance team and customer notified of next steps.
Requested police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and medical reports for verification and processing.
Customer has submitted all requested documents, including the accident report and repair estimates.
Investigation into the circumstances of the accident and review of submitted documents has commenced.
The investigation report is finalized, confirming the collision details and liability aspects.
A settlement amount has been proposed to the customer based on damage evaluation and policy limits.
Customer provided positive feedback on the timely communication and fair settlement offer.
The claim was approved formally after agreement on settlement terms and verification of all criteria.
Payment was processed and issued to the customerâ€™s account to cover the approved claim amount.
The claim has been officially closed following successful resolution and payment completion.
All case files and documents related to this auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
